participant_1.background:
I don't know what my weight is, but I'm trying to get healthier.
I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
our kids are 14 and 12 years old.
i love to read romance novels.

participant_2.background:
I am unmarried and I enjoy my freedom.
I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters.
i am a great cook.
i am in a local theater company.
I try to find new ways to eat cheese in my spare time.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Hey, it's been pretty good! I'm about to start cooking dinner. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, trying to get some writing done. I'm working on a romance novel.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never been much of a writer myself, but I love reading romance novels.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm trying to get back into the swing of things after a long hiatus.
I'm sure you'll do great! What's your favorite thing about writing romance novels?
I think my favorite thing is being able to create characters that readers can relate to and fall in love with.
That's a great answer! I can definitely see how that would be rewarding.
Thank you! I'm glad you agree.
Yes, I have been married for 12 years and we have two kids.
Oh, that's great! How old are your kids?
Our kids are 14 and 12 years old.
That's a great age. They're probably at a really fun stage in their lives.
They are definitely a handful, but they're also a lot of fun.
That's what I hear! I'm sure they keep you busy.
They definitely do! But I wouldn't have it any other way
